#define mod 1000000007
#define ll long long
 
using namespace std;
ll gcd(ll a,ll b) {if(b==0) return a; return gcd(b,a%b);}
 
ll power(ll b,ll exp,ll m)
 {ll ans=1;
  b%=m;
  while(exp)
   {if(exp&1)
     ans=(ans*b)%m;
    exp>>=1;
	b=(b*b)%m;
   }
  return ans;
 }
ll scan()
{
ll t=0;
char c;
c=getchar_unlocked();
while(c<'0' || c>'9')
c=getchar_unlocked();
while(c>='0' && c<='9')
{
t=(t<<3)+(t<<1)+c-'0';
c=getchar_unlocked();
}
return(t);
}
 
int main()
{
  ll t;
  //scanf("%d",&t);
  t=scan();
  while(t--)
  {
  ll n,k,m,ans=0,curr;
  //scanf("%lld %lld %lld",&n,&k,&m);
  n=scan();
  k=scan();
  m=scan();
  curr=n;
  while(1)
  {
        if((double)curr*(double)k>(double)m)
        break;
        curr*=k;
        ans++;
    }
  printf("%lld\n",ans);
}
//getch();
return 0;
